page.title: 15BUILDINGS IN TREVERVA
page.content: The buildings around Treverva are made mostly out of granite rocks and slate for the roofs.The slate is supported by a wooden frame.Most of the houses are old but have been modernised,you can still tell the old design.In one of our three grid squares that we looked at there were seven residential houses and a couple of farms,there was also a caravan and campsite. The farmhouses were large and like the residential houses they were made out of granite and slate.We did not see any derelict houses in the whole of the area.We saw 3 terraced houses of the same shape,size and design.One of the owners had lived in the house for 8 years and never had any problems with it.
